commit.message:
Checking in changes prior to tagging of version 8.54.

Changelog diff is:

diff --git a/Changes b/Changes
index fd183b3..ddc6866 100644
--- a/Changes
+++ b/Changes
@@ -2,6 +2,12 @@ Revision history for Perl application 'greple'.
 
 {{$NEXT}}
 
+8.54 2022-01-29T04:26:00Z
+
+    - Make --blockend option to specify string w/o newline.
+    - Accept file "-" as a STDIN.
+    - Make --face not to change colorspec if already effective.
+
 8.53 2021-12-13T13:12:47Z
 
     - Functional --cm sub{...} works even if --nocolor option given.
Make --face not to change colorspec if already effective.
Make --blockend option to specify string w/o newline.
Use skip() to skip non-tty case.

Checking in changes prior to tagging of version 8.53.
